OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Lunar
OptionLists.Description: You remember the Moon from before it was crowded.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Martian
OptionLists.Description: You help establish the red planetâ€™s colony cities.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Orbital
OptionLists.Description: You overlook the Earth.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Rimward Colonist
OptionLists.Description: You settle Titan, the Main Belt, or an outer-system moon.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Rural Martian
OptionLists.Description: You homestead the Martian outback.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Spacer
OptionLists.Description: You grow up on or work the ships that bring life to the colonies.

OptionLists.Name: Colonist - Sunward Colonist
OptionLists.Description: You grow up on or work the ships that bring life to the colonies.

OptionLists.Name: Enclaver - Ascendor
OptionLists.Description: Against the odds, you work your way up from the poverty of the underclasses.

OptionLists.Name: Enclaver - Corporate Drifter
OptionLists.Description: You bounce between hypercorp positions.

OptionLists.Name: Enclaver - Corporate Favorite
OptionLists.Description: You enjoy a steady corporate gig.

OptionLists.Name: Enclaver - Inheritor
OptionLists.Description: You benefit from generational wealth.

OptionLists.Name: Enclaver - Opportunist
OptionLists.Description: You claw your way into the enclaves via criminal endeavors.

OptionLists.Name: Freelancer - Nomad
OptionLists.Description: You move a lot, chasing work and avoiding climate problems and unrest.

OptionLists.Name: Freelancer - Precarious
OptionLists.Description: You get by, but work and simple existence are tenuous.

OptionLists.Name: Freelancer - Self-Reliant
OptionLists.Description: You survive by DIY means.

OptionLists.Name: Freelancer - Steady
OptionLists.Description: You live in relative stability.

OptionLists.Name: Freelancer - Surrounded by Wolves
OptionLists.Description: You live and work in an area rife with corruption and lawlessness.

OptionLists.Name: Hyperelite - Breakthrough
OptionLists.Description: You had the right idea at the right time.

OptionLists.Name: Hyperelite - Hypercorp Royalty
OptionLists.Description: You family is among the business elites.

OptionLists.Name: Hyperelite - Media Famous
OptionLists.Description: Your family was often in the spotlight.

OptionLists.Name: Hyperelite - Oligarch Dynasty
OptionLists.Description: Your family is rich, wellconnected, and stays out of the spotlight.

OptionLists.Name: Hyperelite - Space Entrepreneur
OptionLists.Description: Your family made its fortunes off-world.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Drone Operator
OptionLists.Description: You manipulate machines from afar.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Educator
OptionLists.Description: You teach or train others.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Emancipated
OptionLists.Description: You work your way to freedom off-world.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Labor Camps
OptionLists.Description: You toil off-world.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Private Staff
OptionLists.Description: You serve the hyperelites or corporate leadership.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Vac Worker
OptionLists.Description: You build habitats or ships.

OptionLists.Name: Indenture - Virtual Worker
OptionLists.Description: You wrangle data in corporate systems.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Anomaly
OptionLists.Description: Your codebase is not based on standard human mind patterns.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Emergent Uplift
OptionLists.Description: You are a smart machine that was on the cusp of achieving intelligence when the programmers reshaped you.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Humanities AGI
OptionLists.Description: You are designed to understand and interact with humans.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Machine AGI
OptionLists.Description: Your mind is optimized for controlling apps and hardware.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Part Human
OptionLists.Description: Your codeline is merged with the neural patterns of a human fork.

OptionLists.Name: Infolife - Research AGI
OptionLists.Description: You are optimized for investigation, data analysis, and scientific endeavors.

OptionLists.Name: Isloate - Drifter
OptionLists.Description: You wander the outskirts of transhuman space.

OptionLists.Name: Isloate - Religious Sect
OptionLists.Description: Your cult or religious group establishes an off-world haven.

OptionLists.Name: Isloate - Separatist
OptionLists.Description: Your people are political dissidents, persecuted minorities, refugees, or others who seek safety on the fringes of the Solar System.

OptionLists.Name: Isloate - Survivalist
OptionLists.Description: Your family fears trouble on Earth and bunkers down off-world.

OptionLists.Name: Lost - Alien Mind
OptionLists.Description: Your mind is nothing like those around you.

OptionLists.Name: Lost - Disturbed Child
OptionLists.Description: You bear permanent mental scars that are often apparent to others.

OptionLists.Name: Lost - Long Past Normal
OptionLists.Description: You pass yourself as normal, but there are deep cracks in your foundation

OptionLists.Name: Lost - Masked Monster
OptionLists.Description: You are a sociopath, but you hide it well.

OptionLists.Name: Lost - Twisted Experiment
OptionLists.Description: Your oddness is palpable.

OptionLists.Name: Underclass - Criminal
OptionLists.Description: You make a living by the only means available to you.

OptionLists.Name: Underclass - Radical
OptionLists.Description: You fight against oppressive systems.

OptionLists.Name: Underclass - Refugee
OptionLists.Description: You are forced to flee war or climate catastrophe.

OptionLists.Name: Underclass - Street Rat
OptionLists.Description: You navigate the challenges of your class with deftness.

OptionLists.Name: Underclass - Survivor
OptionLists.Description: You do what it takes to get by.

OptionLists.Name: Uplift - Escapee
OptionLists.Description: You escape or are liberated from your

OptionLists.Name: Uplift - Feral
OptionLists.Description: You are not as humanized as other uplifts.

OptionLists.Name: Uplift - Lab Rat
OptionLists.Description: You are a test subject or corporate slave.

OptionLists.Name: Uplift - Model Specimen
OptionLists.Description: You are proof of the success of transhumanity’s uplift project.
